name: sourmash

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Sourmash: Quickly search, compare, and analyze genomic and metagenomic
data sets with k-mer sketches.

dependencies.name: py-bitstring
dependencies.description: Simple construction, analysis and modification of binary data.

dependencies.name: py-cachetools
dependencies.description:
This module provides various memoizing collections and decorators,
including variants of the Python 3 Standard Library @lru_cache function
decorator.

dependencies.name: py-cffi
dependencies.description: Foreign Function Interface for Python calling C code

dependencies.name: py-deprecation
dependencies.description:
The deprecation library provides a deprecated decorator and a
fail_if_not_removed decorator for your tests.

dependencies.name: py-matplotlib
dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependencies.name: py-maturin
dependencies.description:
Build and publish crates with pyo3, rust-cpython and cffi bindings as
well as rust binaries as python packages.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-screed
dependencies.description: screed: a Python library for loading FASTA and FASTQ sequences.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
